name: iOS 14.7
available: iPhone 6s and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A shortcut may be able to bypass Internet permission requirements
advisories.description: An input validation issue was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Zachary Keffaber (@QuickUpdate5)

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to access analytics data
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with a new entitlement.

cves.credit: Denis Tokarev (@illusionofcha0s)

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to cause unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: tr3e

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: George Nosenko

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted audio file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: JunDong Xie of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Playing a malicious audio file may lead to an unexpected application termination
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: JunDong Xie of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Opening a maliciously crafted PDF file may lead to an unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved state handling.

cves.credit: ryuzaki

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted font file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Mickey Jin (@patch1t) of Trend Micro, Sunglin of Knownsec 404 team

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to gain root privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: Yizhuo Wang of Group of Software Security In Progress (G.O.S.S.I.P) at Shanghai Jiao Tong University

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to gain root privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Tim Michaud(@TimGMichaud) of Zoom Video Communications

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A sandboxed process may be able to circumvent sandbox restrictions

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to access Find My data

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted font file may lead to arbitrary code execution
